title: Right out of history: Judy Chicago's 'Dinner party'
creator_credit: Johanna Demetrakas, Thom Tyson and Phoenix Films
brief_description: For five years Judy Chicago and four hundred artists and researchers worked to create a tribute to women of spirit and accomplishment whose names have been ignored by history. Film-maker Johanna Demetrakos followed their progress towards a work of unprecedented scale and beauty.
title_for_label: Right out of history: Judy Chicago’s ‘Dinner party’
